I submitted this to MAL and got approved. Please, can someone do a favorable review? I'm annoyed with the very first review there. Come on this is all stop-motion! I don't agree with that review at all. This is art!!! And the song is meaningful especially to fans. I don't have the energy to engage with that reviewer. I'm just hoping someone else will give a better review. I don't really review shows there so I hope someone else would. Please give this a better review.

Oh, and let's add all animated TinyTAN and BT21 animated videos in MAL!

But while watching this video what story I saw is ....BTS started a journey  with hope and expectations. ....then are running and runnig on a desert but there's only sand all over but suddenly a whale (army ) has come and take them into the sky ... But what's that this is just a thought that they got everything (success, happiness, etc )they are in the sky flying living happily .... but they didn't realise that are actually caught on a small bottle somewhere in that desert land .. even got smaller from inside and that happiness was just a show ... author: @nayelihernandez4023
text:
Recordatorio que la ballena de bts no es solo un "concepto". La ballena es algo significativo y especial tanto para bts como para army, tanto que  existe una canciÃ³n en donde inicia el significado especial para esa ballena. "Whalien 52" canciÃ³n de BTS compuesta por Namjoon, Hoseok y Yoongi,  inspirada en whalien 52 considerada  la ballena mÃ¡s solitaria del mundo, resulta que ella naciÃ³ especial: su voz es Ãºnica, mientras que otras ballenas se comunican entre 12hz y 25hz ella lo hace el doble a 52hz y por eso ninguna ballena puede escucharla, su llanto es ignorado asÃ­ que vive en soledad... En los inicios de BTS eran menospreciados por la industria constantemente 
,soportaron las dificultades y siguieron cantando hasta que sus voces, su mÃºsica fueran escuchadas,  y fueron escuchados por Army... BTS y Army le hemos dado un significado muy importante y significativo a estÃ¡ ballena, la asociamos a que cada uno representa esa ballena, eramos silenciosos pero fuimos destinados a encontrarnos y ahora nos hacemos escuchar, ahora no estamos solos.
Esa ballena es tan significativa que incluso la han incluÃ­do en otros mv ejemplo: el mv de wab:the eternal y Zero O'clock, que hace referencia a que no estamos solos nunca mÃ¡s porque nos tenemos el uno al otro. Y podrÃ­a hablar en otras cosas en que ellos han incluÃ­do la ballena pero creo con eso es suficiente para demostrar por quÃ© no es una "simple ballena" 

quiero agregar que esto que dijo Namjoon 
â€œAl igual que â€˜Whalien 52â€™, estaba solo, pero nunca me di cuenta que ustedes (ARMY) son el ancho mar que me abrazo mientras yo respiraba y nadaba. Acogieron mis â€˜hertzâ€™ y los escucharon de una buena manera. Â¿QuÃ© mÃ¡s puedo decir? Estoy muy agradecidoâ€

author: @Catie2010
text:
In the magic door video,  BTS led the way into the magic shop and shepherded the whale  on it's journey  therefore helping the girl (aka ARMY) see the best in herseld and her individuality as she shone in the sky. 
Now it is ARMY's turn to support BTS as they move forward and are in need of the magic shop where ARMY is waiting with love, acceptance and open arms!!  

These 7 guys have changed my life and I can't imagine a day without their music. I've never loved a group as much as I love BTS and that goes for the Beatles. My parents showed me The Beatles and they are important to me in that special way the Beatles affect people. However.  BTS is a group I found all on my own by happenstance at the age of 35.  It's my own thing that no one around me understands. However I've never been swayed by popular opinion in regards to music  because I know what i feel in my heart to be true.   
BTS has lifted me up and opened my world. They've shown me I have reasons to love myself! ğŸ’œ

author: @doesheart6943
text:
Somehow itâ€™s really symbolic. They are looking together for a new and healing next chapter (walking through the exhausting and wide desert), find with us as one unit  and support (whale is coming to travel together) a comforting place (island in the bottle) to calm down, find themselves, mature, do simply what they want without being apart (separate hobbies at separate places but same island). They rest and grow individually for a while without losing touch with army (whale is always in the sky once in a while visible and communicating with them). Towards the end we see them happy and smiling in a open bottle. A light, healing place surrounded by the desert to leave with army whenever theyâ€™re ready.
Really beautiful, I really like it ğŸ’œ

author: @julieharris4700
text:
I'm not crying but I've got tears in my eyes. So many precious images that only ARMY will understand. 
RM leading them across the desert; all of them rolling down the sand dunes; the sparkle in JK's eyes; the whale sounds; JK being the first one brave enough to climb on the whale; Hobi's In the Soop plane; Yoongi on the piano, his goto for comfort; RM reading; Jimin playing with meowing Curry the calico cat; V photography; JK painting; Jin fishing; and the big splash near the end. 
This MV adds so many special things.

text:
Oh it looks like their own magic shop. So beautiful ğŸ˜Š have you recognized the plane from in the scoop?^^
I hope everyone of you can creat their own safe place you can feel comfortable in when times get harsh. Because this days are a part of life like the beautiful and sunny moments. My magic shop helps me a lot then and I hope yours does the same for you. You deserv to be happy and lighthearded so give yourself some help when no one else in your life can do so ğŸ˜‰. I'm honestly thankful to our 7 men for creating such content for us. Their times were hard and I gues still are but they are strong and figure out solutions together. text:
Hay tanto que decir y no saber como expresarlo, solo quiero preparar un lugar mejor para BTS, saber que nos apoyan de diferentes maneras y ahora devolverles un poco de lo mucho que nos han ayudado!
Muy agradecido con ustedes siete y por supuesto apoyo el hecho de que tengan algo de tiempo libre (lo necesitamos todo el tiempo, no somos mÃ¡quinas). Por siempre BTS y ARMY ğŸ’œ
There is so much to say and I don't know how to express it, I just want to prepare a better place for BTS, know that they support us in different ways and now give them back a little of how much they have helped us!

Forever BTS and ARMY ğŸ’œğŸ’œ

author: @carito2112
text:
Probablemente lo que estÃ© por venir sea mejor, porque se los veo a un poco presionados, por seguir conformando y no exactamente a sus fans. La mayor y mejor parte de su ARMY deseamos que sean felices haciendo lo que les gusta, a pesar de que sea mucho trabajo. Y que sean felices en sus vidas personales, elijan a quien elijan tener a su lado, (siempre le tendremos envidia), pero si ellos eligen y son felices, nosotros tambiÃ©n. 
Personalmente, sentÃ­ el anuncio casi como una burla o una falta respeto, no sÃ© cÃ³mo ponerlo. El dÃ­a anterior estaba viendo los millones de videos alegres, tristes, mezclados de emociones pero todos mostraban lo sacrificado que fue el camino para BTS y su hermosa relaciÃ³n con ARMY. Al otro dÃ­a parecÃ­a una cena mÃ¡s, y mientras intentaba seguir los subtÃ­tulos en inglÃ©s, se me iba apagando la sonrisa. 
No estuvo bien el momento, no estuvo bien que no sea en vivo, fue grabado quien sabe cuÃ¡nto tiempo antes, (lo que tambiÃ©n me pareciÃ³ despectivo).
Hace un tiempo que vengo sabiendo que estaban por hacer sus caminos separados, no es eso lo insuperable, es la forma en que se anunciÃ³. 
Hace meses, aÃ±os en pandemia que ya tenÃ­an planeado esto y no fueron sinceros con ARMY. Suerte que Jimin demostrÃ³ que no estaba conforme con la forma y que lo dijo, eso me deja mÃ¡s tranquila. 
Me siento un poco idiota, como enterarte que un amigo estÃ¡ organizando una fiesta y vos te enteras de casualidad.
